about_the_game:
The Adventures of Dumpy takes you on an adventure through different landscapes and environments to save an alien race from being destroyed. It is up to you, Dumpy, to complete tasks and missions to repel the evil forces at large, and maybe you'll meet a pretty girl or boy along the way...

Adventure Platformer

The Adventures of Dumpy takes you through a 2d platformer world full of variety and fun characters to connect with.

Points of Interest

  • Different fun worlds to explore, each with their own unique challenges.
  • Full list of achievements to unlock and push your experience to the limit.
  • (Coming Soon) Multiplayer coop functionality to play with your friends and help each other out with dedicated coop challenges.
  • Hours of gameplay available.
  • Full game support available online.

name: Power Tower

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB memory.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: The Adventures of Dumpy is a 2D adventure platformer that takes you through fun and exciting worlds. Take control of your own character and complete challenges, unlock achievements, save an alien race from certain doom and meet the cyber love of your life.
